item.title: 大众汽车推出紧凑型电动 SUV ID.CROSS
item.description: 大众汽车公司周日发布了一款新型小型电动 SUV 概念车，该概念车是大众汽车公司推出的经济型电池动力汽车的一部分。【原文：Volkswagen on Sunday unveiled a concept for a new small electric SUV that is part of the carmaker's push to offer affordable battery-powered vehicles.】

item.title: 分析师对日本首相石破辞职的看法
item.description: 日本首相石破茂周日表示，他已决定辞职，在世界第四大经济体摇摇欲坠之际，他可能会迎来一段漫长的政策瘫痪期。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said on Sunday he had decided to resign, ushering in a potentially lengthy period of policy paralysis at a shaky moment for the world's fourth-largest economy.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+将从 10 月起进一步提高石油产量
item.description: 欧佩克+"消息人士称，由于全球需求减弱，"欧佩克+"将于周日同意进一步提高石油产量，但与近几个月相比，10月份的增产步伐可能会放缓。【原文：OPEC+ is set to agree to further raise oil output on Sunday while probably slowing the pace of increases from October compared with recent months because of weakening global demand, OPEC+ sources said.】

item.title: 微软称 Azure 因红海光纤中断而中断
item.description: 微软公司周六表示，由于红海的多条海底光纤被切断，其 Microsoft Azure 用户可能会遇到延迟增加的问题。【原文：Microsoft said on Saturday that its Microsoft Azure users may experience increased latency due to multiple undersea fiber cuts in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+很可能在周日同意进一步提高石油产量
item.description: 欧佩克+国家石油输出国组织（OPEC+）的消息人士周六表示，欧佩克+国家石油输出国组织（OPEC+）的八个成员国可能会在周日提高石油产量，但从10月份开始增加的石油产量可能会少于近几个月，因为随着驾驶季节的结束，全球需求可能会放缓。【原文：Eight OPEC+ countries will likely raise oil output on Sunday but probably add less oil from October than in recent months as global demand might be slowing with the end of the driving season, OPEC+ sources said on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会结束对瑞典银行的调查
item.description: 瑞典银行周六表示，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）已结束对该银行的调查，但未采取强制措施。【原文：Swedbank on Saturday said that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has closed its investigation into the bank without enforcement.】

item.title: 加航空乘人员结束工资协议投票
item.description: 加航空乘人员对工资协议的投票结果预计将于周六公布，有半打以上的空乘人员告诉路透社，他们预计临时协议不会获得批准。【原文：Results of a vote by Air Canada flight attendants on a wage agreement are expected on Saturday, with more than a half dozen crew members telling Reuters they don't expect the tentative deal to get approved.】

item.title: 首席财务官表示，宝马将凭借全新纯电动系列在中国恢复增长
item.description: 本周，随着首款车型的推出，宝马对其产品组合进行了重大调整，并启动了新纯电动车（Neue Klasse）系列。【原文：BMW is confident it can return to growth in its largest market China with the all-electric Neue Klasse series, a major overhaul of the company's portfolio that was kick-started this week with the launch of its first model.】

item.title: 下一任美联储主席是？特朗普的候选名单
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在考虑接替杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的三名美联储主席最终人选。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is considering three finalists for Federal Reserve chair to replace Jerome Powell, whom Trump has criticized all year for not cutting rates as he has demanded.】

item.title: 日本称美国贸易协议尚未达成，等待制药和芯片订单
item.description: 东京最高关税谈判代表周六表示，日本与美国的广泛贸易协定 "尚未解决"，因为华盛顿尚未就药品和半导体关税问题发布预期的总统令。【原文：Japan's broad trade agreement with the United States is "not settled," as Washington has not issued expected presidential orders on tariffs for pharmaceuticals and semiconductors, Tokyo's top tariff negotiator said on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，Stellantis 将因驱动力损失召回约 9.2 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周六表示，由于混合动力控制处理器存在软件错误，克莱斯勒所有者Stellantis公司将在美国召回91787辆吉普大切诺基汽车。【原文：Chrysler owner Stellantis is recalling 91,787 Jeep Grand Cherokee vehicles in the U.S. due to a software error within the hybrid control processor, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Saturday.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，OpenAI 预计到 2029 年业务烧掉 1150 亿美元
item.description: 据《信息》周五报道，ChatGPT 的创造者 OpenAI 预计，到 2029 年的现金消耗将达到 1 150 亿美元，比该公司之前的预期高出 800 亿美元。【原文：ChatGPT creator OpenAI projects a cash burn of $115 billion through 2029, or $80 billion higher than the company previously expected, the Information reported on Friday.】

item.title: 现代汽车调查供应商和承包商的雇佣行为
item.description: 现代汽车公司周五表示，将对供应商及其分包商的雇佣行为进行调查。此前，在美国当局的一次大规模突袭行动中，现代汽车公司位于佐治亚州的一家在建汽车电池工厂的数百名工人被拘留。【原文：Hyundai Motor said on Friday that it will investigate the employment practices by suppliers and their subcontractors, after hundreds of workers at a Hyundai Motor car battery facility under construction in the state of Georgia were detained in a major raid by U.S. authorities.】

item.title: 白宫：特朗普签署修改互惠关税范围的相关命令
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五签署了一项行政命令，内容涉及修改互惠关税的范围以及建立贸易和安全协议的执行程序。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday signed an executive order related to modifying the scope of reciprocal tariffs and establishing procedures for implementing trade and security agreements, the White House said.】

item.title: 马斯克在德克萨斯州的新法律支持下获得 1 万亿美元的发薪日
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）从特斯拉（Tesla）获得了 1 万亿美元的巨额薪酬，这证明在得克萨斯州一切都会变得更大，尤其是在新的有利于管理层的法律下。【原文：Elon Musk's blow-out $1 trillion pay package from Tesla proves everything is bigger in Texas, especially under its new management-friendly law.】

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克 1 万亿美元薪酬提案内幕
item.description: 特斯拉周五为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）制定了一项1万亿美元的补偿计划，如果他能将这家电动汽车公司的市值从约1.1万亿美元增至8.5万亿美元，并实现多项运营目标，就能获得补偿。【原文：Tesla outlined a $1 trillion compensation plan for CEO Elon Musk on Friday, which pays out if he is able to grow the EV company's market capitalization from about $1.1 trillion to $8.5 trillion and to hit several operational targets.】

item.title: 苹果公司因在人工智能训练中使用图书遭作家起诉
item.description: 科技巨头苹果公司周五在一桩诉讼中被作家指控非法使用其受版权保护的书籍来帮助训练其人工智能系统，这是人工智能时代知识产权保护法律斗争不断扩大的一部分。【原文：Technology giant Apple was accused by authors in a lawsuit on Friday of illegally using their copyrighted books to help train its artificial intelligence systems, part of an expanding legal fight over protections for intellectual property in the AI era.】

item.title: 英伟达称《GAIN 人工智能法案》将限制竞争，并将其比作人工智能扩散规则
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周五表示，《人工智能GAIN法案》将限制全球先进芯片的竞争，对美国领导力和经济的影响与《人工智能扩散规则》类似，后者对各国可能拥有的计算能力施加了限制。【原文：Nvidia said on Friday the AI GAIN Act would restrict global competition for advanced chips, with similar effects on the U.S. leadership and economy as the AI Diffusion Rule, which put limits on the computing power countries could have.】

item.title: 特斯拉 "超级雄心勃勃 "的马斯克 1 万亿美元交易仍可通过股东审核
item.description: 特斯拉为留住首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）而制定的 10 年 1 万亿美元的薪酬方案，尽管数额惊人，但仍有可能在 11 月举行的公司年度会议上获得股东批准。【原文：Tesla's $1 trillion, 10-year pay package to retain CEO Elon Musk is likely to be approved by shareholders at the company's annual meeting in November even though the amount is staggering.】

item.title: AppLovin、Robinhood 和 Emcor 将加入标准普尔 500 指数
item.description: 道琼斯指数公司（S&P Dow Jones Indices）周五表示，AppLovin、Robinhood Markets 和 Emcor Group 将在 9 月 22 日开盘前加入基准 S&P 500 指数。【原文：AppLovin , Robinhood Markets and Emcor Group will join the benchmark S&P 500 before market open on September 22, S&P Dow Jones Indices said on Friday.】

item.title: 蓝水公司以 100 亿美元竞购 Citgo 母公司
item.description: 蓝水收购公司（Blue Water Acquisition Corp）周五表示，已向委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 的母公司提出价值 100 亿美元的收购要约，其中包括向委内瑞拉违约债券持有人提出的 32 亿美元和解方案。【原文：Blue Water Acquisition Corp said on Friday it submitted an offer valued in $10 billion for the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum, which includes a $3.2 billion settlement proposal to holders of a defaulted Venezuelan bond.】

item.title: 特朗普称国家经济委员会主任哈塞特进入美联储主席候选名单
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五再次表示，他支持国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）成为可能的人选，以便在鲍威尔的任期于2026年5月结束时接替他担任美联储主席。【原文：President Donald Trump repeated his support on Friday for National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett as a possible pick to succeed Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve when Powell’s term ends in May of 2026.】

item.title: 民主党总检察长告诉法庭应调查 HPE 交易
item.description: 科罗拉多州和其他 19 个州的总检察长周五呼吁法院考虑否决美国司法部允许惠普公司以 140 亿美元收购瞻博网络的和解协议。【原文：Attorneys general from Colorado and 19 other states on Friday called for a court to consider rejecting a U.S. Department of Justice's settlement allowing Hewlett-Packard Enterprise to acquire Juniper Networks for $14 billion.】

item.title: Anthropic 告诉美国法官，它将支付 15 亿美元来解决作者集体诉讼案
item.description: Anthropic 公司周五向旧金山联邦法官表示，该公司已同意支付 15 亿美元，以解决一群作家提起的集体诉讼，这些作家指控这家人工智能公司未经许可使用他们的书籍来训练其人工智能聊天机器人 Claude。【原文：Anthropic told a San Francisco federal judge on Friday that it has agreed to pay $1.5 billion to settle a class-action lawsuit from a group of authors who accused the artificial intelligence company of using their books to train its AI chatbot Claude without permission.】

item.title: Roblox 发布短视频应用，提高开发者收益
item.description: Roblox 在周五举行的开发者大会上宣布了一项新的短视频内容应用，并提高了创作者的收入。【原文：Roblox announced a new short-form video content application and an earnings increase for creators at its developers conference on Friday, looking to ride the wave of strong engagement and lure new users to the videogame platform.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比表示尚未决定是否在 9 月降息，并捍卫美联储的独立性
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周五在数据显示就业市场进一步疲软后发表讲话称，他仍未决定9月是否是降息的合适时机，同时他还为美国央行不受短期政治压力影响的必要性进行了辩护。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee, speaking Friday after data showed further job-market weakening, said he is still undecided whether September is the right timing for an interest rate cut, while also defending the need to keep the U.S. central bank insulated from short-term political pressure.】

item.title: 公司利用美国债券市场融资近 700 亿美元，9 月伊始即热闹非凡
item.description: 本周迄今为止，投资级企业借款人在美国债务市场上的融资额接近 700 亿美元，超过了人们对劳动节缩短后的 9 月份第一周的预期，因为借贷成本仍接近历史最低水平。【原文：Investment-grade corporate borrowers tapped U.S. debt markets for nearly $70 billion so far this week, beating forecasts for the Labor Day-shortened first week of September as borrowing costs remain near record lows.】

item.title: 就业数据疲软，投资者期待美国更积极降息
item.description: 一份出人意料地疲软的美国就业报告凸显出经济正在放缓，投资者认为有必要加快货币宽松政策，包括本月大幅降息的可能性增加。【原文：After a surprisingly weak U.S. payrolls report that underscored that the economy is slowing, investors see the need for accelerated monetary easing, including an increased chance of a jumbo interest rate cut this month.】

item.title: 食品杂货商敦促谷物贸易商支持巴西的大豆暂停倡议
item.description: 包括乐购（Tesco）、塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）和阿尔迪（Aldi）（ALDIEI.UL）在内的大型食品零售商已敦促全球谷物贸易商捍卫巴西的大豆暂停倡议，该倡议旨在保护巴西亚马逊地区免遭大豆导致的森林砍伐。【原文：Large food retailers, including Tesco , Sainsbury's and Aldi (ALDIEI.UL) have urged global grain traders to defend Brazil's soy moratorium initiative, a pact designed to protect the Brazilian Amazon from soy-driven deforestation.】

item.title: 美国债券市场可能对潜在的财政和通胀风险过于乐观
item.description: 一些投资者看到了美国债券市场的潜在裂痕，以及近期震荡走势的红色信号，认为市场低估了长期财政风险，以及白宫施压央行降息所带来的危险。【原文：Some investors see potential cracks in the U.S. bond market and red flags from recent whipsawing moves, saying the market is underpricing long-term fiscal risks and the danger posed by White House pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates.】
